description:
AMARK describes itself as a global network of attention ecosystems where merchants purchase the commodity of attention from consumers in exchange for their business. Consumers will sign up to receive rewards from their local businesses. In-Store discounts, XAC redemption, and attention rewards combine to offer consumers value.

name: General Attention Currency
